lead_paragraph: Basketball legend Michael Jordan now owns his Chinese name, after China's highest court sided with him Thursday following a yearslong legal battle over a trademark dispute.

headline.main: Michael Jordan Wins China Court Ruling After Yearslong Case
headline.print_headline: Michael Jordan Wins China Court Ruling After Yearslong Case

snippet: Basketball legend Michael Jordan now owns his Chinese name, after China's highest court sided with him Thursday following a yearslong legal battle over a trademark dispute....
